MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CW3 postcode area of Crewe, affecting properties in Heywood Lane and surrounding streets. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2pm to make urgent repairs to broken equipment. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:35pm on 15th March 2021.
